dishes.name: Bubble Tea
dishes.description: Sweet tea with chewy tapioca pearls,served cold.

dishes.name: Churros
dishes.description: Fried dough sticks rolled in cinnamon sugar.

dishes.name: Kashata
dishes.description: This are sugarand color cotted mango strips

dishes.name: Jalebi
dishes.description: It's a crispy, deep-fried coil or pretzel-shaped confection, typically made from all-purpose flour and then soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup.

dishes.name: Sri Lankan Chicken Curry
dishes.description: A flavorful and aromatic dish known for its rich, spicy, and often tangy taste

dishes.name: Cantucci
dishes.description: Traditional Tuscan almond biscuits characterized by their twice-baked, crunchy texture.

dishes.name: Mbuzi Choma
dishes.description: Grilled Goat Meat

dishes.name: Motichoor laddu
dishes.description: A spherical sweet from the Indian subcontinent made of various ingredients and sugar syrup or jaggery

dishes.name: Mabuyu
dishes.description: Candy made from the seeds of the baobab fruit.

dishes.name: Tacos al Pastor
dishes.description: Pork tacos marinated in spices, served with pineapple.

dishes.name: Chicha
dishes.description: A traditional beverage often made from fermented maize.

dishes.name: Falafel
dishes.description: Deep-fried ball or patty-shaped fritter

dishes.name: Gado gado
dishes.description: Salad known for its combination of steamed or blanched vegetables, fried tofu and tempeh, and a rich, spicy peanut sauce.

dishes.name: Caldo Verde
dishes.description: Potato and Kale Soup With Sausage

dishes.name: Ukwaju
dishes.description: A refreshing and tangy beverage made from the pulp of the tamarind fruit.

dishes.name: Smocha
dishes.description: A wrap that contains a smokie/sausage on the inside with kachumbari and sauces, all folded up using a chapati.

dishes.name: Pretzels
dishes.description: Type of a baked pastry made from dough that is commonly shaped into a knot.

dishes.name: Russian kvas
dishes.description: Fermented Slavic beverage made from rye bread.

dishes.name: Mijui
dishes.description: Chinese alcoholic beverage made from fermented glutinous rice.

dishes.name: Maori bread (rēwena parāoa)
dishes.description: Its made from boiling and mashing potatoes, then adding flour and sugar.

dishes.name: Barbacoa
dishes.description: Meat was slow-cooked in an underground pit or over an open fire.

dishes.name: Ugandan Rolex
dishes.description: A popular food item in Uganda prepared by combining an egg omelette and vegetables wrapped in a chapati.
